title: Auto-GPT Implementation from Chapter 9
description: Implement the Auto-GPT functionality as described in Chapter 9 of the course materials. This includes setting up the autonomous agent system, configuring the decision-making logic, and implementing the task execution pipeline. Focus on understanding the core concepts of autonomous agents and their practical applications.

title: Database Schema Design
description: Design and implement a comprehensive database schema for the user management system. Include proper relationships, constraints, and indexes. Document your design decisions and provide migration scripts. Consider scalability and performance implications.
completion_notes: Started working on the user table structure. Need to clarify relationship with roles table.

title: API Documentation Update
description: Update the API documentation to reflect recent changes in the authentication endpoints. Include examples, error codes, and rate limiting information. Ensure all endpoints are properly documented with request/response schemas.
completion_notes: Completed all API documentation updates. Added comprehensive examples and error handling guides.
